AlertTarget.description: A structure containing the alert target ARN and the role ARN.

properties.name: AlertTargetArn
properties.description: The ARN of the notification target to which alerts are sent.

type.description: The ARN of the notification target to which alerts are sent.

properties.name: RoleArn
properties.description: The ARN of the role that grants permission to send alerts to the notification target.

type.description: The ARN of the role that grants permission to send alerts to the notification target.

properties.name: Metric
properties.description: What is measured by the behavior.

type.description: What is measured by the behavior.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name for the behavior.

type.description: The name for the behavior.

properties.name: SuppressAlerts
properties.description: Manage Detect alarm SNS notifications by setting behavior notification to on or suppressed. Detect will continue to performing device behavior evaluations. However, suppressed alarms wouldn't be forwarded for SNS notification.

type.description: Manage Detect alarm SNS notifications by setting behavior notification to on or suppressed. Detect will continue to performing device behavior evaluations. However, suppressed alarms wouldn't be forwarded for SNS notification.

BehaviorCriteria.description: The criteria by which the behavior is determined to be normal.

properties.name: ComparisonOperator
properties.description: The operator that relates the thing measured (metric) to the criteria (containing a value or statisticalThreshold).

type.description: The operator that relates the thing measured (metric) to the criteria (containing a value or statisticalThreshold).

properties.name: ConsecutiveDatapointsToAlarm
properties.description: If a device is in violation of the behavior for the specified number of consecutive datapoints, an alarm occurs. If not specified, the default is 1.

type.description: If a device is in violation of the behavior for the specified number of consecutive datapoints, an alarm occurs. If not specified, the default is 1.

properties.name: ConsecutiveDatapointsToClear
properties.description: If an alarm has occurred and the offending device is no longer in violation of the behavior for the specified number of consecutive datapoints, the alarm is cleared. If not specified, the default is 1.

type.description: If an alarm has occurred and the offending device is no longer in violation of the behavior for the specified number of consecutive datapoints, the alarm is cleared. If not specified, the default is 1.

properties.name: DurationSeconds
properties.description: Use this to specify the time duration over which the behavior is evaluated.

type.description: Use this to specify the time duration over which the behavior is evaluated.

ExportMetric.description: Flag to enable/disable metrics export for metric to be retained.

MachineLearningDetectionConfig.description: The configuration of an ML Detect Security Profile.

properties.name: ConfidenceLevel
properties.description: The sensitivity of anomalous behavior evaluation. Can be Low, Medium, or High.

type.description: The sensitivity of anomalous behavior evaluation. Can be Low, Medium, or High.

properties.name: DimensionName
properties.description: A unique identifier for the dimension.

type.description: A unique identifier for the dimension.

properties.name: Operator
properties.description: Defines how the dimensionValues of a dimension are interpreted.

type.description: Defines how the dimensionValues of a dimension are interpreted.

MetricToRetain.description: The metric you want to retain. Dimensions are optional.

properties.name: Metric
properties.description: What is measured by the behavior.

type.description: What is measured by the behavior.

MetricValue.description: The value to be compared with the metric.

properties.name: Cidrs
properties.description: If the ComparisonOperator calls for a set of CIDRs, use this to specify that set to be compared with the metric.

type.description: If the ComparisonOperator calls for a set of CIDRs, use this to specify that set to be compared with the metric.

properties.name: Count
properties.description: If the ComparisonOperator calls for a numeric value, use this to specify that (integer) numeric value to be compared with the metric.

type.description: If the ComparisonOperator calls for a numeric value, use this to specify that (integer) numeric value to be compared with the metric.

properties.name: Number
properties.description: The numeral value of a metric.

type.description: The numeral value of a metric.

properties.name: Numbers
properties.description: The numeral values of a metric.

type.description: The numeral values of a metric.

properties.name: Ports
properties.description: If the ComparisonOperator calls for a set of ports, use this to specify that set to be compared with the metric.

type.description: If the ComparisonOperator calls for a set of ports, use this to specify that set to be compared with the metric.

properties.name: Strings
properties.description: The string values of a metric.

type.description: The string values of a metric.

StatisticalThreshold.description: A statistical ranking (percentile) which indicates a threshold value by which a behavior is determined to be in compliance or in violation of the behavior.

properties.name: Statistic
properties.description: The percentile which resolves to a threshold value by which compliance with a behavior is determined

type.description: The percentile which resolves to a threshold value by which compliance with a behavior is determined

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The tag's key.

type.description: The tag's key.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The tag's value.

type.description: The tag's value.

resource.description: A security profile defines a set of expected behaviors for devices in your account.

properties.name: AdditionalMetricsToRetainV2
properties.description: A list of metrics whose data is retained (stored). By default, data is retained for any metric used in the profile's behaviors, but it is also retained for any metric specified here.

type.description: A list of metrics whose data is retained (stored). By default, data is retained for any metric used in the profile's behaviors, but it is also retained for any metric specified here.

properties.name: AlertTargets
properties.description: Specifies the destinations to which alerts are sent.

type.description: Specifies the destinations to which alerts are sent.

properties.name: Behaviors
properties.description: Specifies the behaviors that, when violated by a device (thing), cause an alert.

type.description: Specifies the behaviors that, when violated by a device (thing), cause an alert.

properties.name: MetricsExportConfig
properties.description: A structure containing the mqtt topic for metrics export.

type.description: A structure containing the mqtt topic for metrics export.

properties.name: MqttTopic
properties.description: The topic for metrics export.

type.description: The topic for metrics export.

properties.name: RoleArn
properties.description: The ARN of the role that grants permission to publish to mqtt topic.

type.description: The ARN of the role that grants permission to publish to mqtt topic.

properties.name: SecurityProfileDescription
properties.description: A description of the security profile.

type.description: A description of the security profile.

properties.name: SecurityProfileName
properties.description: A unique identifier for the security profile.

type.description: A unique identifier for the security profile.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: Metadata that can be used to manage the security profile.

type.description: Metadata that can be used to manage the security profile.

properties.name: TargetArns
properties.description: A set of target ARNs that the security profile is attached to.

type.description: A set of target ARNs that the security profile is attached to.

itemType.description: The ARN of the target to which the security profile is attached.

attributes.description: A security profile defines a set of expected behaviors for devices in your account.

properties.name: SecurityProfileArn
properties.description: The ARN (Amazon resource name) of the created security profile.

type.description: The ARN (Amazon resource name) of the created security profile.
